title: Oracle & SUSE Join Forces To Fight Red Hat
description:
I thought this was just a joke but no Oracle, SUSE and CIQ are now working together on the Open Linux Enterprise Association to create a neutral entity to manage the source of Enterprise Linux that isn't Red Hat
